tidbits.title: Historical Sites
tidbits.description: Jordan is home to iconic historical sites like Petra, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, showcasing impressive rock-carved architecture.

tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: The country boasts diverse landscapes, from the ancient city of Jerash to the unique Dead Sea, one of the world's saltiest bodies of water.

tidbits.title: Hospitality and Culture
tidbits.description: Jordan is known for its hospitality and rich culture, offering warm welcomes, delicious cuisine, and traditional Bedouin customs.
